name: Hyper Balls (kevwpl)
description:
Controls
[Space] - Change Direction
[D] or [J] - Dash

Welcome to Hyper Balls - the ultimate test of your reflexes and agility! In this addictive arcade game, you control a ball that moves around a circular track, collecting points as it goes. But watch out - deadly saws are floating around everywhere, ready to slice you up at any moment.

Your goal is to collect as many points as possible while dodging the saws. The game starts off easy, but as you progress, the saws become more numerous and move faster, making it a real challenge to survive.
